body.title: Mixins

  ul

Mixins allow you to create reusable code blocks.
See: [Mixins](https://pugjs.org/language/mixins.html)

body.title: Mixin attributes
body.elms:
```jade
mixin pet(name)
  span.pet= name
```
{: data-line="1"}

```jade
+pet('cat')
```

See: [Mixin attributes](https://pugjs.org/language/mixins.html#mixin-attributes)

body.title: Mixin blocks
body.elms:
```jade
mixin article(title)
  article
    h2.title= title
    block
```
{: data-line="1,4"}

```jade
+article('hello there')
  p Content goes here
```

See: [Mixin blocks](https://pugjs.org/language/mixins.html#mixin-blocks)
